campaignPerformance.name: CTM - Brand Terms - Search - Stay Loyal
CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

campaignPerformance.name: CTM - Non Brand - Shopping  - Stay Loyal - Chicken & Lamb
CTM - Non Brand - Shopping  - Stay Loyal - Salmon Only

keyInsights.insight: $2,336 spent on 137 zero-conversion search terms (51% of visible spend).
1 campaign(s) losing ~$1,218/month: CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim (0.29x ROAS on $1,715).
Only 24% Search Impression Share — missing 76% of eligible searches.
Top performer: "CTM - Brand Terms - Search - Stay Loyal" at 2.73x ROAS ($5,049 spend, $13,804 revenue).

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 5 conversion actions (1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x PURCHASE, 1x ADD_TO_CART, 1x UNKNOWN). Recording 269 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 269 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 5 conversion categories: 1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 1x PURCHASE, 1x ADD_TO_CART, 1x UNKNOWN.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: No obvious duplicate conversion actions detected.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 5 actions recording 269 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $2,336 spent on 137 zero-conversion search terms (51% of $4,594 visible search spend). Top waste: "stay loyal dog food reviews" $511, "sniffspace" $241, "fergusons treatos" $147, "dog boutique" $123, "forcyte" $109.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 16 list(s) with 2075 total negatives. Good coverage with themed lists.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 2075 negative keywords across 16 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Product spend waste
checks.finding: 0.37% of top-50 product spend ($48 of $12,905) goes to 10 zero-conversion products.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $5,049 spend, 124.2 conv, $41 CPA. Exact: $0 spend, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: No significant zero-conversion keyword spend detected.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 2 naming prefix(es) across 8 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 4 ad groups across 8 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 8 campaigns: 4 SEARCH, 2 PERFORMANCE_MAX, 2 SHOPPING.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: Brand campaign exists — protects branded terms from competitors.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: PMax active — cross-channel reach across Search, Display, YouTube, Gmail, Maps, Discover.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: Both Search and PMax active — PMax takes priority for exact match queries. Use brand exclusions in PMax and monitor cannibalization.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 8 campaigns, $1,402/day budget, 24% Search Impression Share. Top: CTM - Performance Max  +Brand Stay Loyal (1.31x ROAS, $12,334). Worst: CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim (0.29x ROAS, $1,715). $1,715/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $1,402/day budget, ~$674/day actual spend (48% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Settings > Locations.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 8.3/10 across 3 scored keywords (3 at 7+, 0 below 5).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 3251 of 4080 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 8.3 indicates good keyword-to-ad relevance.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 3 RSAs: 3 Good/Excellent, 0 need improvement (2 GOOD, 1 EXCELLENT).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: 2 PMax campaign(s). CTM - Performance Max  +Brand Stay Loyal: $12,334 spend, 1.31x ROAS, $101 CPA, 122.1 conv. CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim: $1,715 spend, 0.29x ROAS, $260 CPA, 6.6 conv.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 1.17%. Below minimum threshold — review ad copy relevance and keyword targeting.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS, MAXIMIZE_CONVERSION_VALUE, TARGET_ROAS.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 24% Search Impression Share — missing 76% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 98 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 11 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 3 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 178 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 6 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 24 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: 1 Customer Match list(s) uploaded.

quickWins.action: Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "stay loyal dog food reviews", "sniffspace", "fergusons treatos"... — $2,336 wasted.
Pause or restructure "CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim" — 0.29x ROAS on $1,715, losing ~$1,218/month.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.
Fix: Geographic targeting — "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Se
Fix: CTR vs benchmark — Account CTR: 1.17%. Below minimum threshold — review ad copy relevance and keyword targeting.
Fix: Search impression share — 24% Search Impression Share — missing 76% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

items: 1 campaign(s) are losing money ($1,218/month): CTM - Pmax - Remarketing Aim (0.29x ROAS, $1,715). Restructure keywords/targeting or reduce budget.
$2,336 wasted on 137 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "stay loyal dog food reviews", "sniffspace", "fergusons treatos", "dog boutique", "forcyte".
Account is well-optimized. Test new ad variations and expand audience targeting.
Increase Search Impression Share from 24% — you're missing 76% of potential customers.
With 269 conversions/month, test Demand Gen or Display remarketing for upper-funnel growth.
